en.title: Official Appointment
en.content:
YUAN YUFANG
 
FusionExcel welcomes Olympic Athlete and Quantum Pendant Wearer Yuan Yufang. Yuan Yufang is a 2 times Olympian representing Malaysia in the 20 Km Walk 2000 Sydney Olympics and 2004 Athens Olympics. She will again be representing Malaysia in the 2008 Beijing Olympics. 

Yuan Yufang has been using FusionExcel’s Quantum Pendant during her trainings and found it has helped improve her performance with increased energy and concentration. 

YUAN YUFANG CREDENTIAL:

- Winner of SEA Games Gold Medals 1999 to 2007. (20 km walk).
- 3 Times Winner and Record Holder of Kuala Lumpur International Marathon.
- 2 Times Bronze Medal Winner Asian Walking Championships.
- Bronze Medal Winner Commonwealth Games, Manchester 2002.

meta.description: Yuan Yufang as FusionExcel Spokesperson for our amazing Quantum Pendant.
